participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and empathetic, Alex enjoys connecting with others and appreciates artistry in everyday designs.
participant_1.background: I once got to see the Red Hot Chili Peppers in concert! It was an amazing experience. I like playing games online. My favorite animals are dolphins. I am proud of my ability to create designs that people love and use in their everyday lives. My girlfriend tells me she’s going to leave me almost every day.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and independent, Jamie values her freedom and believes in shaping her own future.
participant_2.background: I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands. My mother is in the hospital. My dog's name is Wonwon. I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted. I really like watching Star Trek.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Not too bad, thanks for asking! I'm a little worried about my mom, though. She's in the hospital right now.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope she gets better soon.
I like to play video games, watch Star Trek, and spend time with my dog, Wonwon.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like all sorts of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
Me too! I'm playing through Skyrim right now.
Nice! I've been playing a lot of Final Fantasy XIV lately.
Oh, that's a good one too. I've never played it, though.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for talking to me. I hope your mom feels better soon.
